summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6217 for the improvement of 27th Avenue Northeast from East 75th Street to approximately 300 feet north thereof; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 88663 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
